Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45824583
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1798
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3365
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2603
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep965
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10111012
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45824583
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1798
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3365
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2603
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep965
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep47
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep193194
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep439
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep2021
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various “human experiments” and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Zhongkui Kill Demon Legend
programme.desc: The Heavenly Master trapped the spirit of the Demon King so as to save the world from evil. Before he dies, the trapped spirit is transferred into Zhong Kui. As a half human and half demon, Zhong Kui is torn between good and evil. Which side will he finally choose?

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other’s mole.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lam’s daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government’s secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor’s ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung’s house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung’s mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Patricia Ha stars with Deanie Ip in her most famous and audacious role as a young woman rising to fame as a popular bargirl in this local answer to Hollywood's The World of Suzie Wong.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit’s camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader’s wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen’s property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love…

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun’s plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord’s home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists’ cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong’s enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Movies - Miss India
programme.desc: Tamil Drama Film, Starring, Keerthy Suresh, Jagapathi Babu, and Rajendra Prasad

programme.title: Movies - Mishan Impossible
programme.desc: Tamil comedy thriller film, Taapsee Pannu, Harsh Roshan, Bhannu Prakshan & Jayateertha Molugu

programme.title: Movies - Cbi 5
programme.desc: Tamil CBI thriller film, Starring - Mammootty, Mukesh, Jagathy Sreekumar, Saikumar & Renji Panicker

programme.title: Movies - Kolamaavu Kokila
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Starring, Nayantara, Yogi Babu, Saranya Ponvannan, Hareesh Peradi, Rajendran & Others

programme.title: Movies - The Great Father
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, Starring, Mammootty, Rony David, Anu Joseph, Molly Kannamaly & Others

programme.title: Movies - Yaamirukka Bayamey
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Krishna, Oviya, Rupa, Anaswara Kumar, Karunakaran & Others

programme.title: Movies - Inji Iduppazhagi
programme.desc: Tamil romantic comedy film, Starring, Anushka Shetty, Sonal Chauhan, Arya, Prakash Raj & Others

programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Movies - Kaadan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Rana Daggubati, Zoya Hussain, Shriya Pilgaonkar, Pulkit Samrat

programme.desc: The Winters family undergoes an upheaval when Marie, the daughter, relocates to Berlin. Tanja plans on divorcing Matthias, leaving him with a wounded pride. He fights to save his marriage but fails, until he rediscovers a new perspective in life.

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.

programme.title: Pelican Blood
programme.desc: Weibke and her nine-year-old daughter Nicolina are elated when they finally adopt five-year-old Raya. However, Weibke soon notices Raya displaying abnormally aggressive behavior. With advice from experts, Weibke is forced to make a painful decision.

programme.title: Road to Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: I'm Losing It
programme.desc: When her fitness-obsessed boyfriend dumps her for a skinny girl, shy and chubby Anna resolves to slim down and win him back. But, with help from her plump health-nut buddy Nick, Anna discovers that true happiness is more than six-pack abs.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.

programme.title: Road to Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia
programme.desc: Ena’s fiancé cancels the planned wedding - but just then she learns that she has a family in Croatia. At the sea, under the southern sun, she not only meets her loving grandmother but also a hostile sister-in-law and a romantically inclined fisherman.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: For Emma & Ever
programme.desc: Emma, a wedding registrar, is unhappily married. When a former lover, Ben, re-appears in her life with a fiancée in tow, she’s taken a back. Long buried emotions come flooding back, and Emma is faced with a difficult decision to make.

programme.title: The Soul Of The Tigre
programme.desc: Alex, a young Franco-Chinese man, learns of his brother’s mysterious death, and returns to his family in the Chinese district of Paris. With the help of his cousin Lily, he investigates his brother’s death and uncovers a family secret.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: Ms Busche
programme.desc: After her son leaves for college, Katrin, a single mother, finds love again. However, her happiness is fleeting as challenges implode in her life. Her father has an accident, her ex-husband tries to repossess the house and her son unexpectedly returns home.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors – a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) – he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep7

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep8

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep9
programme.desc: Can't Be Held Accountable - A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator. Kat disobeys the Captain's orders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep10
programme.desc: Must Be Held Accountable - A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep11

programme.desc: Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.desc: Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.desc: Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep17

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep1
programme.desc: 30 Rock - Pilot - Head writer Liz Lemon finds herself defending her live TV show when brash new network executive Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) starts meddling.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep2
programme.desc: The Aftermath - One erratic star (Tracy Morgan), one neurotic star (Jane Krakowski), and a meddlesome boss (Alec Baldwin) create panic in the writers room.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep3
programme.desc: Blind Date - Jack plays matchmaker, setting Liz up on a blind date.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep4
programme.desc: Jack The Writer - Liz keeps aspiring writer Jack from taking over the writers room and Kenneth the Page tries desperately to impress Tracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep5
programme.desc: Jack-Tor - Jack (Alec Baldwin) aspires to act and Tracy (Tracy Morgan) reveals a painful secret.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep6
programme.desc: Jack Meets Dennis - Liz Lemon goes back to her ex-boyfriend Dennis, (guest star Dean Winters) simply because she's bored.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep7
programme.desc: Tracy Does Conan - Two stars arguing over a coveted appearance on "Late Night with Conan O'Brien" (guest star Conan O'Brien) push Liz Lemon to the edge.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep8
programme.desc: The Break-Up - Liz finally calls it quits with Dennis (guest star Dean Winters) while personal politics pit Toofer against Tracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep9
programme.desc: The Baby Show - Liz (Tina Fey) and Jack (Alec Baldwin) both battle maternal woes. Chris Parnell guest stars.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep10
programme.desc: The Rural Juror - Jenna awaits the opening of her long-anticipated movie while Tracy digs out of debt.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep11
programme.desc: The Head and The Hair - Liz falls for an attractive guy and Jack walks in Kenneth's shoes.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep12
programme.desc: Black Tie - Tracy tempts Pete while Liz gets a glimpse into Jack's past.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep13
programme.desc: Up All Night - Valentine's Day goes awry for TGS cast. After the entire cast binges on some questionable seafood at the craft services table, they hunker down to pull an all nighter -- on Valentine's Day -- and cobble a new show together.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep14
programme.desc: The "C" Word - Liz works overtime to prove to her writers that she's a good boss in "30 Rock".

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep15
programme.desc: Hard Ball - Jack negotiates Josh's contract while Kenneth the Page earns a spot in Tracy's entourage.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep16
programme.desc: The Source Awards - Jack forces Tracy to attend The Source Awards, while Kenneth the Page catches the eye of a hip-hop star's girlfriend -- with special guest stars LL Cool J, Wayne Brady and Ghostface Killah.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep17
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish - Jack welcomes his brother Eddie (Special Guest Star Nathan Lane) into the 'TGS' family.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep18
programme.desc: Fireworks - Jack (Alec Baldwin) turns to Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) for help when an aggressive West Coast NBC exec (Special Guest Star Will Arnett) declares he's after Donaghy's job.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep19
programme.desc: Corporate Crush - Liz finds love while Jack fights to keep his job.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep20
programme.desc: Cleveland - Liz (Tina Fey) mulls a Midwest move while Jack (Alec Baldwin) plans to wed.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep21
programme.desc: Hiatus - With the end of 'TGS' season near, Liz and the cast face decisions that rock the show in the season finale; Emmy Winners Sean Hayes, Elaine Stritch and Chris Parnell Guest Star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep1
programme.desc: SeinfeldVision - The gang at "30 Rock" returns from their summer hiatus.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Jack Gets In The Game - On the heels of Jack (Alec Baldwin) realizing that GE head Don Geiss (Guest Star Rip Torn) may be retiring, Jack's nemesis, Devin, (Guest Star Will Arnett) returns engaged to Don's daughter.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Collection - In an effort to cut off any chance of GE digging up dirt against him, Jack (Alec Baldwin) hires his own private investigator, Len (Guest Star Steve Buscemi), to head them off.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Rosemary's Baby - When Liz (Tina Fey) meets her idol, Rosemary Howard (Guest Star Carrie Fisher), she invites her to be a guest writer on the show.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Greenzo - As part of a GE-wide green initiative, Jack (Alec Baldwin) has come up with the idea of creating a green mascot for NBC -- a Philly Fanatic-looking character named Greenzo.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Somebody To Love - Jack (Alec Baldwin) attends a cocktail party honoring Colin Powell, and there, he falls for C.C. (Guest Star Edie Falco), a Democratic congresswoman from Vermont.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Cougars - As part of his community service, Tracy (Tracy Morgan) takes on the duties of coaching an inner city little league team from Knuckle Beach, the worst neighborhood in New York.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets And Lies - C.C. (Edie Falco) wants to go public over her love for Jack (Alec Baldwin), while Liz (Tina Fey) tries to appease both Tracy (Tracy Morgan) and Jenna (Jane Krakowski). With special guest stars Edie Falco and James Carville.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ludachristmas - It's time again for the office's annual 'Ludachristmas' party and Liz and Jack's families come to visit. Special guests Elaine Stritch, Andy Richter, Buck Henry and Anita Gillette guest star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Jack (Alec Baldwin) and C.C. (guest star Edie Falco) try to make their long distance love affair work. Liz (Tina Fey) invests in real estate for the first time and Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) gets hooked on caffeine. Special guests include Edie Falco and Gladys Knight.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Someone calls Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) a "Class A Moron" and the New York Post's "Page Six" column picks it up causing Jack agitation. Guest star Rob Huebel.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Subway Hero - Liz's (Tina Fey) old boyfriend, Dennis Duffy (guest star Dean Winters) becomes New York's "Subway Hero" and Jack (Alec Baldwin) wants him booked on the show. Tim Conway guest stars.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Succession - Don Geiss (guest star Rip Torn) confides to Jack (Alec Baldwin) that he will be named the new GE chairman and Jack names a new successor to his position. Will Arnett and Chris Parnell also guest star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Sandwich Day - Liz's (Tina Fey) ex-boyfriend Floyd (guest star Jason Sudeikis) returns to New York while Jack's (Alec Baldwin) days with GE may be numbered. It's Sandwich Day at "TGS" and the sandwich shop location is kept tightly guarded by the Teamsters. Rip Torn and Brian Dennehy also guest star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Cooter - Jack heads to Washington, DC while Liz has a pregnancy scare, and Kenneth applies to be a page for the Summer Olympics. Tracy is in the final stages of his new invention. Matthew Broderick, Edie Falco, Dean Winters, and Paul Scheer guest star.

programme.title: Equator From The Air (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Africa - In Africa, Gordon takes to the skies to see how a growing human population is affecting wildlife, from flamingos and elephants in Kenya, to humpback whales off the coast of Gabon.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S7) Ep2
programme.desc: Trains - Gregg gets special access to learn how the ultimate train is made: a huge 187-tonne, five-carriage electric train. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits an HS2 construction site to learn how two huge tunnel boring machines are digging ten miles through the hills. And historian Ruth Goodman is energised by the history of electric trains.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Yorkshire - On a 15-mile walk in North Yorkshire, Kate sets off from the picturesque village of Robin Hood's Bay, heading towards Scarborough where a refreshing dip in the sea awaits her.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S7) Ep3
programme.desc: Buses - The red double-decker bus is a global icon. They carry millions of passengers every day across the capital and are as synonymous with London as Tower Bridge and Buckingham Palace. Now, Gregg Wallace has special access to a factory in Scarborough, Yorkshire, where they build this famous people mover.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep3

programme.desc: San Diego - In San Diego, Robson aims to become only the second angler in the world to have registered the Shark Grand Slam by reeling in three different species of fish in a single day.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Socorro - Steve Backshall is in Mexico exploring the Eastern Pacific and the Ravillagigedo Archipelago to find ways to protect the local shark population.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Niceness - Griff Rhys Jones begins his exploration of Ontario at Niagara Falls, right on the U.S border, to uncover what it is that makes Canadians so nice.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Maldives - Paradise Shrinking Ep7
programme.desc: The Maldives, a low-lying archipelago in the Indian Ocean, faces an uncertain future. Rising sea levels threaten to wipe out this tiny island nation. As the water rises, researchers are using nature to help keep the Maldives from disappearing. They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Wetland Wonder Ep8
programme.desc: Southern Africa is gripped in a punishing drought. Across the region plants and animals are suffering. At times like this water becomes critical survival and wetlands become magnets for life. This film is a celebration of South Africa’s greatest wetland – Lake St Lucia.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck Ep6
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesia’s sprawling archipelago are home to the world’s richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. Within this undersea Amazon, a hidden ecosystem goes unnoticed. Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. It is a place where predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race and develop ever-more unlikely ways of attack and defense. On this mucky seabed, nothing is as it seems. It is a place where fish can walk and even change colors.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Maldives - Paradise Shrinking Ep7
programme.desc: The Maldives, a low-lying archipelago in the Indian Ocean, faces an uncertain future. Rising sea levels threaten to wipe out this tiny island nation. As the water rises, researchers are using nature to help keep the Maldives from disappearing. They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck Ep6
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesia’s sprawling archipelago are home to the world’s richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. Within this undersea Amazon, a hidden ecosystem goes unnoticed. Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. It is a place where predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race and develop ever-more unlikely ways of attack and defense. On this mucky seabed, nothing is as it seems. It is a place where fish can walk and even change colors.

programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5

The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mini Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings Ep2
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Fraser Island Ep4
programme.desc: Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The More the Merrier - Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing chores—all proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isn’t all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The More the Merrier - Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing chores—all proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: A Bee's Diary - In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.desc: Nuttypunny / Jealohsy - When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.desc: Breakers / A Day Without Tech - To save their family vacation, the Tucci's must “out-party” the hard-partying Breakers; When Boov-tech stops working, Oh goes off the grid.

programme.desc: Sins Of The Past - After Heather is lured to the Northern Markets as a trap, Hiccup flies to find her, but when he arrives too late, Windshear is captured by Krogan

programme.desc: A Savage Place - After winning the trust of the Zephilim, Puss storms the Blind King's castle in hopes of saving his friends, restoring the true ruler of the Netherworld, and blocking the Portal for good

programme.desc: The Day Before Tomorrow - King Julien rallies his troops and comes up with a plan for all of them to work together to destroy the mountain lemurs once and for all

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged Ep65
programme.desc: Bad Build - When the Dinotruxs own talents are used against them Ty realizes that truxing it up may not always be the best plan

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep29

But when Father is given a new deadline for a big project, Olivia hatches a plan to help him out. First, however they have to track down Ian's missing frog.

programme.title: Olivia Ep30

programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep65
programme.desc: A Savage Place - After winning the trust of the Zephilim, Puss storms the Blind King's castle in hopes of saving his friends, restoring the true ruler of the Netherworld, and blocking the Portal for good

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep65
programme.desc: Sins Of The Past - After Heather is lured to the Northern Markets as a trap, Hiccup flies to find her, but when he arrives too late, Windshear is captured by Krogan

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep65
programme.desc: Lions' Pride (Part 2) - Voltron must battle the biggest and baddest Robeast yet before it is drained of its Quintessence

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep65

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.desc: Bad Business / Anniversorry - Sammy are Hugo are running for Junior Business Club President, but when the votes come in they are tied...// Dada and Dadi's anniversary party is at the same time as arcade night! Can the boys find a way to be in two places at once?

programme.desc: 15 Candles / Rook, Line and Sinker - Already planning Ronnie Anne's quinceañera, Rosa decides to train Ronnie Anne - for the next 3 years! // Carlos gets Carl into chess to keep him out of trouble, but Carl takes his rule of the kingdom literally!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Cheer Pressure / Stroke of Luck - Lori becomes a celebrity at school when she hits a hole-in-one on a notoriously difficult course. // The cheerleaders challenge Lynn and her teammates to a 'cheer off' when Lynn dismisses them as athletes.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Space Jammed / Crown and Dirty - Annoyed by Leni's intrusive babysitting, Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space. // Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep22
programme.desc: Something Smells / Bossy Boots - SpongeBob eats sea onion ice cream and his breath stinks. When people avoid him, Pat convinces him that it's because he's ugly. // When Mr. Krabs gives his daughter Pearl a job at the Krusty krab, she starts to make some changes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep182
programme.desc: Little Yellow Book / Bumper to Bumper - Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep207
programme.desc: Mimic Madness / House Worming - SpongeBob learns that "imitation is the sincerest form of flattery" - too bad no one told him how to stop! // When worms move in to SpongeBob's holes, it's up to him to hide his disgusting new friends from everyone else.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering - Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Ay Fidelity / Cut the Chisme - When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Sidekickin' Chicken / Silent Fight - After hearing about a contest to find El Falcon's next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Kick Some Bot / Salvador Doggy - Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep52
programme.desc: Chocolate With Nuts / Superfriends - To make some extra cash, Spongebob and Patrick decide to sell chocolate door to door. // Barnacle Boy wants to be called "Barnacle Man" and rebels when everyone rejects his request.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep38
programme.desc: Sailor Mouth / Artist Unknown - SpongeBob reads a "bad" word off a dumpster behind the Krusty Krab and he doesn't know what it means. // When Spongebob enrolls in Squidward's community art class, arrogant Squidward attempts to teach him strictly by the book.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep39
programme.desc: Jellyfish Hunter / The Fry Cook Games - Mr. Krabs discovers that customers love SpongeBob's special jellyfish jelly Krabby Patty. He begins to take advantage of the jellyfish. // Mr. Krabs enters SpongeBob in the Fry Cook Games where he competes against Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep40
programme.desc: Squid on Strike / Sandy, SpongeBob and the Worm - Believing Mr. Krab is taking advantage, Squidward convinces Spongebob to join with him and threaten Mr. Krabs with a strike. // A large worm is terrorizing Bikini Bottom and SpongeBob is terrified of it.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Summer Santa / Closed for Cocooning - When Santa shows up for summer vacation, Angus is conveniently injured and needs Santa to deliver the mail. // Parker wants to help Lily's sisters plan her "Wing Ding," but it's clear the little nimbus doesn't quite fit in.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep112
programme.desc: They're All Named Reggie - After delivering mail in Purpleton, the gang finds a Baby Reggie stowaway that Parker insists on returning home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.desc: The Earth King - The kids battle Long Feng the Dai Li when they attempt to show the Earth King the vast conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has feverish dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep123
