programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Kanga Management / Rat Fink - It's game night and the penguins are playing hot potato with a live bomb. // According to the penguin's intel, the sewer rats are up to something BIG. They need an undercover operative. But who is rat-like enough to pull off such a mission? Mort.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Employee of the Month / Brocrastination - Buhdeuce's life is about to change forever when SwaySway gives out an award. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce have to take care of a pile of dirty dishes, before IT takes care of THEM!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Brendar the Barbarian - Brendar, kicked out of the Royal Order of Warrior Princesses, is left as a "feared and revered" Barbarian. Troll Evan is an aspiring musician who burns his own bridge and convinces Brendar to bring him on her quest to defeat an evil demon.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Small Change / Rip Van Stinkle - Felicity is questioning what she's meant to be when she baby-sits a little changeling girl, struggling with the same issue. // When Felicity comes to the aid of a stinky stranger named Rip Van Stinkle, he vows to be at her beck and call for life.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Brett Venom, M.D. / Laughquake - Sanjay and Craig infiltrate the hospital to see the world’s first butt transplant. // Sanjay and Craig go on a quest to find the ultimate laugh.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Ollie In The House / The Ollie Files - After getting grounded, Ollie is stuck alone in the house with no backpack and an angry moth monster. // Ollie panics when two nosy government agents show up to investigate possible monsters in Portshill.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Wizboy / Pick a Nose - There's a new kid at school (Kyle) and Fanboy & Chum Chum are determined to show their new friend a great time. // Fanboy and Chum Chum agree to swap noses for Class Picture Day, but Fanboy gets jealous of the attention Chum Chum suddenly receives.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Dudley Do-Wrong / Puppy Unplugged - The Chameleon impersonates Mayor Teddy Bear and closes down TUFF, turning all of Petropolis against our heroes. // Birdbrain plunges the world into a technology-less void.

programme.desc: The Shark's Eye - Daphne tells Bloom about a nymph Politea, who is under a dark spell. Politea's Sirenix power could be what Tritannus needs to become Emperor of the Infinite Ocean, but Darcy and Stormy are determined to keep this from happening.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Saving Paradise Bay - The Magic Dimension's future is hanging by a thread. Bloom and Sky lead the Sovereign Council in agreement to unite and fight Tritannus. But first the Winx must find the Breath of the Ocean in order to save a polluted bay.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep112

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.desc: Sold! / Lame and Fortune - When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward’s delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep44
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep64
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The Drum Ep49
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep13
programme.desc: The Western Bulldogs host the Brisbane Lions under the roof in Melbourne to open Round 3 with Thursday Night AFL footy.

programme.title: The World Ep64
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.desc: In 2023 Leigh Sales is back in a brand new role presenting Australian Story, bringing you more fascinating stories about everyday Australians that entertain and inspire.

programme.title: 7.3 Ep48
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep64
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The Drum Ep49
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep64

programme.title: The Business Ep36
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Landline Ep6
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: The Drum Ep49
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S31 Ep16
programme.desc: Jerry Coleby-Williams checks out a successful wildlife corridor, Sophie Thomson visits a farm growing botanicals for beauty products, Tino Carnevale demonstrates crop rotation and Jane Edmanson makes a kokedama.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep65
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you the latest news and interviews. Plus Tony Armstrong with sport, Madeleine Morris with finance and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep65
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Joe O'Brien in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep65
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S31 Ep17
programme.desc: Costa Georgiadis meets GA presenter Clarence Slockee at a native rooftop farm, Jane Edmanson explores a patch of highly endangered grassland and we meet Yindjibarndi artist Katie West to explore her plant-based art practice.

programme.title: Lost For Words S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The students have two weeks left of this year's adult literacy and numeracy program, where they will attempt to complete each of their goals and conquer one final hurdle, to deliver a graduation speech.

programme.title: Throwback: Our Childhoods Revisited Ep6

programme.title: Pacific Upside

programme.title: Design Stories

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan

programme.title: Taiwan The Windy Frontline Islands
programme.desc: The Kinmen Islands, just offshore of the Chinese mainland, are known for strong winds. We visit their rich culture that has been influenced by the mainland while being nurtured by the winds.

programme.title: Taiwan The Windy Frontline Islands

programme.desc: Towada-Hachimantai National Park comprises the nature-rich Oirase-Keiryu, the crystal-clear Lake Towada, and the lush marshlands of Mt. Hachimantai. It presents nature in its many forms.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini

programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort what's true from what's fake online. The Truth or Fake is a short program designed to alert everyone to the dangers of fake news. The hosts emphasize that media literacy is a key part of the broad fight against disinformation.

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Located 30km north-east of Florence in the beautiful countryside of Tuscany, Mugello is a modern circuit with excellent facilities. Bought by Ferrari back in 1988, the 5.245km track has been renovated to a high standard and has a growing reputation as one of the world’s most up-to-date, scenic and safest race circuits. A blend of slow and fast turns with sweeping curves, long straights and off-camber corners make Mugello one of the most challenging circuits for the riders and engineers. Having hosted its first MotoGP event back in 1976 the venue became a permanent fixture in 1991 after extensive refurbishment. Set within a beautiful tree lined Tuscan valley, Mugello also offers ample viewing areas for a particularly boisterous and partisan Italian crowd.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2303
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022
